name: Trip To another World
description:
A really short game where you experience a trip to another Planet some 1,653 light years away using a teleportation machine.

It's a really short game made during my free time using RPGMaker.

This is also my first game ever made so it has some dumb mistakes since i deleted the .rvproj2 file and can't fix them. 

i hope you enjoy it a little bit.
